author: paul_wolfenden
post: Im intrigued because if you notice the top of the head area it appears as if a shaft of light is entering the crown. The crown chakra is well known to phsychics and mediums as the doorway of the soul to the universal spirit, Halos are also the light around the crown chakra..
title: Corona discharge for Shroud of Turin – advance notice of my paper for presentation at the Quantum Theology 2012 Conference, Instituto Polytecnica of Mamma Mia, Italy
